sources.title: Magpie Madness (1948)
sources.description: Heckle and Jeckle, the always-talking Magpies, kick this one off by stealing a bowl of bones from Soupbone, an old hound dog. Soupbone raises some objections that leads to a fracas or two, with all hands ending up in a nervous place, and the two birds trying to rescue Soupbone from a padded cell. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/magpie-madness-1948/

metadata.Plot: Heckle and Jeckle, the always-talking Magpies, kick this one off by stealing a bowl of bones from Soupbone, an old hound dog. Soupbone raises some objections that leads to a fracas or two, with all hands ending up in a nervous place, and the two birds trying to rescue Soupbone from a padded cell.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
